prompt: Photorealistic wide shot of a professional art appraiser, mid-50s, wearing glasses, meticulously examining the brushstrokes and signature on a large, ornate 18th-century oil painting using a magnifying glass and a small focused light. The setting is a quiet, richly decorated private gallery room with soft, directional spotlighting creating dramatic chiaroscuro effects on the painting and the appraiser's face. The painting dominates the right two-thirds of the 16:9 frame, emphasizing its scale, while the appraiser leans in from the left. Shallow depth of field focuses on the interaction point. Style: Cinematic, detailed, professional realism. --ar 16:9
name: art-appraiser-image-1.png

prompt: Photorealistic medium wide shot capturing an experienced art appraiser working late in a cozy, book-lined personal study. The appraiser sits at a large antique wooden desk cluttered with open art history books, auction catalogues, provenance documents, and a laptop displaying an art database. Warm light from a green banker's lamp illuminates the desk area, casting soft shadows in the room filled with bookshelves. The composition uses the 16:9 frame to show the breadth of the desk and research materials in the foreground, with the appraiser slightly off-center, deeply focused on their research. Style: Scholarly, atmospheric, detailed realism. --ar 16:9
name: art-appraiser-image-2.png

prompt: Photorealistic wide establishing shot within a bright, minimalist modern art gallery. A stylishly dressed contemporary art appraiser gestures towards a large, colorful abstract metal sculpture, explaining its features to a client (seen partially or from behind). The clean white walls and polished concrete floor emphasize the modern aesthetic. The sculpture is the main focal point, positioned slightly off-center in the 16:9 frame, with the appraiser and client interacting to one side, utilizing negative space effectively. Lighting is bright, even, and diffused. Style: Clean, modern, professional realism. --ar 16:9
name: art-appraiser-image-3.png

prompt: Photorealistic medium close-up shot focusing on the hands of an art appraiser wearing white cotton gloves, carefully handling an intricate antique Chinese porcelain vase on a dark velvet cloth. The appraiser uses a jeweler's loupe to examine a detail near the base. The setting is an appraisal room, with shelves of other ceramics and antiques softly blurred in the background. The 16:9 composition emphasizes the horizontal arrangement of the hands, object, and tools across the frame, highlighting the texture and detail of the porcelain. Lighting is soft and focused on the vase and hands. Style: Meticulous, elegant, detailed realism. --ar 16:9
name: art-appraiser-image-4.png

prompt: Photorealistic medium shot of an art appraiser in a conservation lab setting, using a handheld XRF analyzer pointed at an Old Master drawing laid flat on a table. A nearby tablet screen displays elemental analysis data or a magnified image section. The appraiser wears lab attire. The background includes organized shelves with conservation tools and equipment. The 16:9 landscape format allows for showing the appraiser, the drawing, the technology in use, and the connected screen readout side-by-side. Lighting is clean, neutral, and clinical. Style: Scientific, precise, modern realism, high-tech. --ar 16:9
name: art-appraiser-image-5.png
